languages.text: "Вил'Ирлиет не заслужила смерти. Для нее она будет освобождением от скорбной доли бытия нечистым ксеносом". {n}В черных глазах Кибеллы вспыхивает убийственная ярость.{/n} "Но мы... Мы заслужили ее смерть. Как плату за то, что пережили".

traits.locale_text: "Вил'Ирлиет не заслужила смерти. Для нее она будет освобождением от скорбной доли бытия нечистым ксеносом". {n}В черных глазах Кибеллы вспыхивает убийственная ярость.{/n} "Но мы... Мы заслужили ее смерть. Как плату за то, что пережили".

languages.text: "Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."
languages.original_text: "Вил'Ирлиет не заслужила смерти. Для нее она будет освобождением от скорбной доли бытия нечистым ксеносом". {n}В черных глазах Кибеллы вспыхивает убийственная ярость.{/n} "Но мы... Мы заслужили ее смерть. Как плату за то, что пережили".

traits.locale_text: "Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being a foul xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

"Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being a foul xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

"Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being a foul xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

"Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

"Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

languages.text: «Vil'Yrliet no merece morir. Para ella, sería una liberación de la pesarosa carga de ser una xenos blasfema». {n}La furia asesina atraviesa los ojos negros de Kibellah.{/n} «Pero nosotros... sí merecemos que muera, como pago por todo lo que hemos sufrido».
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

traits.locale_text: «Vil'Yrliet no merece morir. Para ella, sería una liberación de la pesarosa carga de ser una xenos blasfema». {n}La furia asesina atraviesa los ojos negros de Kibellah.{/n} «Pero nosotros... sí merecemos que muera, como pago por todo lo que hemos sufrido».

languages.text: 「ユリエットは死に値しません。彼女にとって、それは穢れた異種族であるという悲しむべき運命からの解放なのです」{n}キベラの黒い瞳に殺意に満ちた怒りが宿る。{/n}「しかし、我々は…我々は彼女の手による死に値します。我らが耐えてきたことの代償として」
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットは死に値しません。彼女にとって、それは穢れた異種族であるという悲しむべき運命からの解放なのです」{n}キベラの黒い瞳に殺意に満ちた怒りが宿る。{/n}「しかし、我々は…我々は彼女の手による死に値します。我らが耐えてきたことの代償として」

languages.text: “敌者伊莉耶特不配得到死亡，因为对她而言，得到死亡的恩赐，便等同于摆脱了身为邪恶异形的悲惨命运。”{n}绮贝菈的黑眼珠中闪过了充满杀意的怒火。{/n}“但她的死亡……对我们而言是值得的。我们遭受了那样的折磨，她的死亡是我们应得的补偿。”
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

traits.locale_text: “敌者伊莉耶特不配得到死亡，因为对她而言，得到死亡的恩赐，便等同于摆脱了身为邪恶异形的悲惨命运。”{n}绮贝菈的黑眼珠中闪过了充满杀意的怒火。{/n}“但她的死亡……对我们而言是值得的。我们遭受了那样的折磨，她的死亡是我们应得的补偿。”

languages.text: "Vil'Yrliet verdient den Tod nicht. Für sie wäre es die Befreiung aus ihrem traurigen Schicksal als unreine Xenos." {n}In Kibellahs schwarzen Augen blitzt mörderischer Zorn auf.{/n} "Aber wir ... wir verdienen ihren Tod. Als Bezahlung dafür, was wir durchgemacht haben."
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

traits.locale_text: "Vil'Yrliet verdient den Tod nicht. Für sie wäre es die Befreiung aus ihrem traurigen Schicksal als unreine Xenos." {n}In Kibellahs schwarzen Augen blitzt mörderischer Zorn auf.{/n} "Aber wir ... wir verdienen ihren Tod. Als Bezahlung dafür, was wir durchgemacht haben."

languages.text: « Vil'Yrliet ne mérite pas de mourir. Cela reviendrait à la délivrer de sa triste condition de xénos impure. » {n}Une rage meurtrière embrase le regard noir de Kibellah.{/n} « Nous en revanche... nous méritons sa mort. En guise de dédommagement pour ce que nous avons subi. »
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."

traits.locale_text: « Vil'Yrliet ne mérite pas de mourir. Cela reviendrait à la délivrer de sa triste condition de xénos impure. » {n}Une rage meurtrière embrase le regard noir de Kibellah.{/n} « Nous en revanche... nous méritons sa mort. En guise de dédommagement pour ce que nous avons subi. »

languages.text: "Vil'Yrliet ölümü hak etmiyor. Onun gözünde ölüm, yoldan çıkmış bir zeno olmaktan doğan hüznünden kurtuluş olurdu." {n}Kibellah'nın kara gözlerinde ölümcül bir öfke parıldıyor.{/n} "Ancak biz... Onun ölmesini hak ediyoruz. Dayandığımız onca şeyin bedeli bu."
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet does not deserve death. For her, it would be a release from her sorrowful lot of being an unclean xenos." {n}Murderous rage flashes in Kibellah's black eyes.{/n} "But we... we do deserve her death. As payment for what we have endured."
